analysis.description:
Reentrancy in EtheremonPayment.catchMonster (/unique_chucks/25/0x721da477f68c71788a262d58853fe6977d86535e.sol#271-305):
	External calls:
	- (class.classId,class.price,class.returnPrice,class.total,class.catchable) = data.getMonsterClass(_classId) (/unique_chucks/25/0x721da477f68c71788a262d58853fe6977d86535e.sol#280-283)
	- data.getMonsterDexSize(_trainer) > maxDexSize (/unique_chucks/25/0x721da477f68c71788a262d58853fe6977d86535e.sol#288-290)
	- objId = data.addMonsterObj(_classId,_trainer,_name) (/unique_chucks/25/0x721da477f68c71788a262d58853fe6977d86535e.sol#291-292)
	- value = getRandom(STAT_MAX,uint8(i),lastHunter) + data.getElementInArrayType(ArrayType.STAT_START,uint64(_classId),i) (/unique_chucks/25/0x721da477f68c71788a262d58853fe6977d86535e.sol#296-301)
	- data.addElementToArrayType(ArrayType.STAT_BASE,objId,value) (/unique_chucks/25/0x721da477f68c71788a262d58853fe6977d86535e.sol#301)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastHunter (/unique_chucks/25/0x721da477f68c71788a262d58853fe6977d86535e.sol#302-303)
class in EtheremonPayment.catchMonster (/unique_chucks/25/0x721da477f68c71788a262d58853fe6977d86535e.sol#279) is a local variable never initialiazed

EtheremonPayment.withdrawToken (/unique_chucks/25/0x721da477f68c71788a262d58853fe6977d86535e.sol#234-242) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_sendTo,_amount) (/unique_chucks/25/0x721da477f68c71788a262d58853fe6977d86535e.sol#241-242)

EtheremonPayment.giveBattleBonus (/unique_chucks/25/0x721da477f68c71788a262d58853fe6977d86535e.sol#256-260) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_trainer,_amount) (/unique_chucks/25/0x721da477f68c71788a262d58853fe6977d86535e.sol#259-260)

EtheremonPayment.catchMonster (/unique_chucks/25/0x721da477f68c71788a262d58853fe6977d86535e.sol#271-305) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-data.addElementToArrayType(ArrayType.STAT_BASE,objId,value) (/unique_chucks/25/0x721da477f68c71788a262d58853fe6977d86535e.sol#301)

EtheremonPayment.catchMonster has external calls inside a loop:
	- value = getRandom(STAT_MAX,uint8(i),lastHunter) + data.getElementInArrayType(ArrayType.STAT_START,uint64(_classId),i) (/unique_chucks/25/0x721da477f68c71788a262d58853fe6977d86535e.sol#296-301)

EtheremonPayment.catchMonster has external calls inside a loop:
	- data.addElementToArrayType(ArrayType.STAT_BASE,objId,value) (/unique_chucks/25/0x721da477f68c71788a262d58853fe6977d86535e.sol#301)

EtheremonDataBase.totalClass should be constant (/unique_chucks/25/0x721da477f68c71788a262d58853fe6977d86535e.sol#117)
EtheremonDataBase.totalMonster should be constant (/unique_chucks/25/0x721da477f68c71788a262d58853fe6977d86535e.sol#117)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/25/0x721da477f68c71788a262d58853fe6977d86535e.sol#230-231:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/25/0x721da477f68c71788a262d58853fe6977d86535e.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.16 (/unique_chucks/25/0x721da477f68c71788a262d58853fe6977d86535e.sol#1): it allows old versions
